original_text: Which was the son of Maath, which was the son of Mattathias, which was the son of Semei, which was the son of Joseph, which was the son of Juda,
korean_text: 그 위는 마앗이요 그 위는 맛다디아요 그 위는 서머인이요 그 위는 요섹이요 그 위는 요다요

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Maath,
which was the son of Mattathias,
which was the son of Semei,
which was the son of Joseph,
which was the son of Juda,
